00033   // Assume all groups are already sorted or matched...
00034 
00035   AtomicGroup averageStructure(const std::vector<AtomicGroup>& ensemble) {
00036     AtomicGroup avg = ensemble[0].copy();
00037 
00038     // First, zap our coords...
00039     int n = avg.size();
00040     int i;
00041     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00042       avg[i]->coords() = GCoord(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00043 
00044     // Now, accumulate...
00045     std::vector<AtomicGroup>::const_iterator j;
00046     for (j = ensemble.begin(); j != ensemble.end(); j++) {
00047       for (i = 0; i<n; i++)
00048         avg[i]->coords() += (*j)[i]->coords();
00049     }
00050 
00051     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00052       avg[i]->coords() /= ensemble.size();
00053 
00054     return(avg);
00055   }

00058 
00059   AtomicGroup averageStructure(const std::vector<AtomicGroup>& ensemble, const std::vector<XForm>& xforms) {
00060     if (xforms.size() != ensemble.size())
00061       throw(LOOSError("Transforms do not match the passed ensemble in loos::averageStructure()"));
00062 
00063     AtomicGroup avg = ensemble[0].copy();
00064 
00065     // First, zap our coords...
00066     int n = avg.size();
00067     int i;
00068     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00069       avg[i]->coords() = GCoord(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00070 
00071     // Now, accumulate...
00072     for (uint j=0; j<ensemble.size(); ++j) {
00073       AtomicGroup frame = ensemble[j].copy();
00074       frame.applyTransform(xforms[j]);
00075       for (i = 0; i<n; i++)
00076         avg[i]->coords() += frame[i]->coords();
00077     }
00078     
00079     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00080       avg[i]->coords() /= ensemble.size();
00081 
00082     return(avg);
00083   }

00088   AtomicGroup averageStructure(const AtomicGroup& g, const std::vector<XForm>& xforms, pTraj& traj, std::vector<uint>& frame_indices) {
00089     AtomicGroup avg = g.copy();
00090     AtomicGroup frame = g.copy();
00091     int n = avg.size();
00092     for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00093       avg[i]->coords() = GCoord(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00094     
00095     uint tn = traj->nframes();
00096     uint fn = frame_indices.size();
00097     
00098     // Safety check...
00099     if (fn != xforms.size())
00100       throw(std::runtime_error("Mismatch in number of frames in the trajectory requested and passed transforms for loos::averageStructure()"));
00101     
00102     for (uint j=0; j<fn; ++j) {
00103       if (frame_indices[j] >= tn)
00104         throw(std::runtime_error("Frame index exceeds trajectory size"));
00105       
00106       traj->readFrame(frame_indices[j]);
00107       traj->updateGroupCoords(frame);
00108       frame.applyTransform(xforms[j]);
00109       for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00110         avg[i]->coords() += frame[i]->coords();
00111     }
00112     
00113     for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00114       avg[i]->coords() /= fn;
00115     
00116     return(avg);
00117   }

00120   
00121   AtomicGroup averageStructure(const AtomicGroup& g, const std::vector<XForm>& xforms, pTraj& traj) {
00122     uint nx = xforms.size();
00123     uint nt = traj->nframes();
00124     
00125     if (nt != nx)
00126       throw(std::runtime_error("Mismatch in number of frames in the trajectory and passed transforms"));
00127     std::vector<uint> frame_indices;
00128     for (uint i=0; i<nt; ++i)
00129       frame_indices.push_back(i);
00130 
00131     return(averageStructure(g, xforms, traj, frame_indices));
00132   }

00138   boost::tuple<std::vector<XForm>,greal,int> iterativeAlignment(std::vector<AtomicGroup>& ensemble,
00139                                                                 greal threshold, int maxiter) {
00140     int iter = 0;
00141     int n = ensemble.size();
00142     greal rms;
00143     std::vector<XForm> xforms(n);
00144     AtomicGroup avg;
00145 
00146     // Start by aligning against the first structure in the ensemble
00147     AtomicGroup target = ensemble[0].copy();
00148 
00149     target.centerAtOrigin();
00150 
00151     do {
00152       for (int i = 0; i<n; i++) {
00153         GMatrix M = ensemble[i].alignOnto(target);
00154         xforms[i].premult(M);
00155       }
00156 
00157       avg = averageStructure(ensemble);
00158       rms = avg.rmsd(target);
00159       target = avg;
00160       iter++;
00161     } while (rms > threshold && iter <= maxiter );
00162     
00163     boost::tuple<std::vector<XForm>, greal, int> res(xforms, rms, iter);
00164     return(res);
00165   }

00168 
00169   boost::tuple<std::vector<XForm>, greal, int> iterativeAlignment(const AtomicGroup& g, pTraj& traj, std::vector<uint>& frame_indices,
00170                                                                   greal threshold, int maxiter) {
00171     std::vector<AtomicGroup> frames;
00172 
00173     uint nf = frame_indices.size();
00174     uint nt = traj->nframes();
00175 
00176     for (uint i=0; i<nf; ++i) {
00177       if (frame_indices[i] >= nt)
00178         throw(std::runtime_error("Frame index exceeds trajectory size"));
00179 
00180       traj->readFrame(frame_indices[i]);
00181       AtomicGroup frame = g.copy();
00182       traj->updateGroupCoords(frame);
00183       frames.push_back(frame);
00184     }
00185 
00186     boost::tuple<std::vector<XForm>, greal, int> result = iterativeAlignment(frames, threshold, maxiter);
00187     return(result);
00188   }
00189 
00190 
00191   boost::tuple<std::vector<XForm>, greal, int> iterativeAlignment(const AtomicGroup& g, pTraj& traj,
00192                                                                   greal threshold, int maxiter) {
00193 
00194     std::vector<uint> frame_indices;
00195     uint nt = traj->nframes();
00196     for (uint i=0; i<nt; ++i)
00197       frame_indices.push_back(i);
00198     return(iterativeAlignment(g, traj, frame_indices, threshold, maxiter));
00199   }

00203   void applyTransforms(std::vector<AtomicGroup>& ensemble, std::vector<XForm>& xforms) {
00204     uint n = ensemble.size();
00205     if (n != xforms.size())
00206       throw(std::runtime_error("Mismatch in the size of the ensemble and the transformations"));
00207 
00208     for (uint i=0; i<n; ++i)
00209       ensemble[i].applyTransform(xforms[i]);
00210   }

00214   void readTrajectory(std::vector<AtomicGroup>& ensemble, const AtomicGroup& model, pTraj trajectory) {
00215     AtomicGroup clone = model.copy();
00216     
00217     while (trajectory->readFrame()) {
00218       trajectory->updateGroupCoords(clone);
00219       AtomicGroup frame = clone.copy();
00220       ensemble.push_back(frame);
00221     }
00222   }
00223 
00224 
00225   void readTrajectory(std::vector<AtomicGroup>& ensemble, const AtomicGroup& model, pTraj trajectory, std::vector<uint>& frames) {
00226     AtomicGroup clone = model.copy();
00227     
00228     std::vector<uint>::iterator i;
00229     for (i = frames.begin(); i != frames.end(); ++i) {
00230       if (*i >= trajectory->nframes())
00231         throw(std::runtime_error("Frame index exceeds trajectory size in readTrajectory()"));
00232       trajectory->readFrame(*i);
00233       trajectory->updateGroupCoords(clone);
00234       AtomicGroup frame = clone.copy();
00235       ensemble.push_back(frame);
00236     }
00237   }

00241   RealMatrix extractCoords(const std::vector<AtomicGroup>& ensemble) {
00242     uint n = ensemble.size();
00243     uint m = ensemble[0].size();
00244     RealMatrix M(3*m, n);
00245 
00246     for (uint i=0; i<n; ++i)
00247       for (uint j=0; j<m; ++j) {
00248         M(3*j, i) = ensemble[i][j]->coords().x();
00249         M(3*j+1, i) = ensemble[i][j]->coords().y();
00250         M(3*j+2, i) = ensemble[i][j]->coords().z();
00251       }
00252 
00253     return(M);
00254   }
00255 
00256 
00257   RealMatrix extractCoords(const std::vector<AtomicGroup>& ensemble, const std::vector<XForm>& xforms) {
00258     uint n = ensemble.size();
00259 
00260     if (n != xforms.size())
00261       throw(std::runtime_error("Mismatch between the size of the ensemble and the transformations"));
00262 
00263     uint m = ensemble[0].size();
00264     RealMatrix M(3*m, n);
00265 
00266     for (uint i=0; i<n; ++i) {
00267       GMatrix W = xforms[i].current();
00268 
00269       for (uint j=0; j<m; ++j) {
00270         GCoord c = W * ensemble[i][j]->coords();
00271         M(3*j, i) = c.x();
00272         M(3*j+1, i) = c.y();
00273         M(3*j+2, i) = c.z();
00274       }
00275     }
00276 
00277     return(M);
00278   }
00279 
00280 
00281   void subtractAverage(RealMatrix& M) {
00282     uint m = M.rows();
00283     uint n = M.cols();
00284     double *avg = new double[m];
00285     
00286     for (uint j=0; j<m; ++j)
00287       avg[j] = 0.0;
00288 
00289     for (uint i=0; i<n; ++i)
00290       for (uint j=0; j<m; ++j)
00291         avg[j] += M(j, i);
00292 
00293     for (uint j=0; j<m; ++j)
00294       avg[j] /= n;
00295 
00296     for (uint i=0; i<n; ++i)
00297       for (uint j=0; j<m; ++j)
00298         M(j,i) -= avg[j];
00299   }

00301 
00302   boost::tuple<RealMatrix, RealMatrix, RealMatrix> svd(std::vector<AtomicGroup>& ensemble, bool align) {
00303 
00304     RealMatrix M;
00305     if (align)
00306       iterativeAlignment(ensemble);
00307     
00308     M = extractCoords(ensemble);
00309 
00310     subtractAverage(M);
00311     boost::tuple<RealMatrix, RealMatrix, RealMatrix> res = Math::svd(M);
00312     return(res);
00313   }
